The GRE PEARL (the size of a golf ball) ROLLS to Percy's feet. He picks it up. Grover picks up the sword and it TURNS BACK a pen. He HANDS IT to Percy, who is concerned, worried.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Where's Annabeth?

dialogues.speaker: ON ANNABETH
dialogues.text: The Hysterical Woman continues to PULL Annabeth through t maze of statues. Annabeth finally STOPS the woman.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Look! You've got to tell me what's going on! Who are we running from?!?

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Leaving so soon? Annabeth turns to the direction of the VOICE. A WOMAN, dressed all in black, is standing there.  50. She is wearing a LONG BLACK GOWN, that covers everything her hands. Her hair is wrapped in a BLACK TURBAN. She wea IMPENETRABLE BLACK SUNGLASSES. This is MEDUSA.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: Leaving so soon? The Hysterical Woman SCREAMS. Annabeth BACKS AWAY. Medusa looks at Annabeth, sniffs the air around her.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: You have such beautiful gray eyes. I've only seen eyes like that once before... Medusa slowly starts to UNWRAP her turban.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: +..on the face of the bitch that did this to me. As she unwraps her turban, we see the FACE of Medusa for first time... greenish, cracked, distorted, and PULSATING She removes the last of the turban, revealing the LIVING, HISSING SNAKES that are her hair. The snakes are SNAPPING each other. ANGRY. Annabeth is FREAKED.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: The daughter of Athena here in my emporium. And my hair so unruly. Medusa walks to the Coca-Cola cooler and OPENS IT. Medusa bends down, LOWERS her head into the cooler. When she pul her head out, each of her hair-snakes has a MOUSE in its mouth, swallowing them. It's a HORRIFIC SIGHT. This cause the snakes to CALM down slightly, stop fighting each othe Medusa approaches the girls. Annabeth recoils in horror a the snakes SNAP at her. Medusa LOWERS her sunglasses...

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: I've seen your eyes. It's time for you to see mine. She takes off her glasses, revealing her GLOWING YELLOW E Annabeth quickly LOOKS AWAY. The Hysterical Woman CAN'T RESIST a peek. She looks and is HYPNOTIZED. As she stares into Medusa's eyes, she begins to TURN TO STONE. Her hand TURNS TO STONE, still holding Annabeth's arm. Annabeth shudders, CAN'T BREAK FREE from the cement grip. Medusa MOVES her face to within inches of Annabeth's face The snakes "FEEL" Annabeth's face, as if they were the fingers of a blind person. Annabeth keeps her EYES SEALED  51.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: What a wonderful addition you'll make to my collection. Or perhaps I'll send you back to Mom. One piece at a time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy and Grover WATCH from the cover of the statues.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: How are we supposed to fight something we can't look at?

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You can look at her reflection. Ina mirror or something. Grover pulls an iTOUCH from his pocket, holds it up. Medu is visible in the REFLECTIVE BACK. Percy GRABS it.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You get Annabeth while I distract Medusa. Percy sighs, SNEAKS OFF, iTouch in one hand, the pen in t other. He DUCKS behind a large statue, holds out the iTou to get a VIEW of Medusa, who is still in Annabeth's face.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: Sooner or later you will open those big grey eyes. The temptation to look is too hard to resist.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I could resist your ugly-ass face for a looooong time. Medusa SPINS around, hisses.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: Who is that!? Who's there!? Medusa WALKS to the edge of the statue maze. She looks around, SNIFFS the air. Percy MOVES SWIFTLY from statue t statue, keeping a view of Medusa in his iTouch mirror.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: I can smell you, Demigod. Come out and I may let you live. Medusa WALKS into the statue maze. Seconds later, Grover RUNS OUT, to Annabeth. He WHISPERS to her.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You can open your eyes. It's me, Grover.  52.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (opens her eyes) Grover! Thank Gods. Auntie Em is-- Grover SLAMS HIS CRUTCH INTO the arm of the Hysterical Wo statue. It CRUMBLES, releasing Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Medusa. We know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Medusa RACES through the maze, honing in on Percy. Even t snakes are SEARCHING, LOOKING AROUND. But Percy RUNS AHEA watching her every move in his iTouch's reflective surfac

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: Who are you? Why are you here?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: The name is Percy Jackson... He stealthily DUCKS to another position. Medusa FOLLOWS.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Son of Poseidon. As Medusa gets CLOSER and CLOSER, Percy grips his PEN.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: So it is true. The mighty Poseidon has a child. Percy DOESN'T RESPOND. Medusa is TOO CLOSE. A few more steps and she'll be in STRIKING DISTANCE.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: You can't hide for long, Lightning Thief. These statues are not just my victims... She lets out a LOUD, TERRIFYING HISSSSSSS.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: They are my slaves. The statues near Percy COME TO LIFE, GRAB HIM. The iTouch FALLS to the ground. Medusa STEPS forward, gets RIGHT IN Percy's face. He CLOS his eyes. The snakes are all posed to STRIKE at once.

dialogues.speaker: MEDUSA
dialogues.text: I'll give you a choice. Give me the lightning bolt... Or die by the poison fangs of my serpents...  53. A CAR HORN BLARES! Medusa LOOKS UP, sees... Her rusted PICK-UP TRUCK, CRASHING through the path of statues, HEADING DOWN THE PATH, toward them. GROVER is at the wheel, ANNABETH is beside him. Both are BLINDFOLDED. Percy uses the distraction to KICK Medusa away. He CLICKS the pen, turns it INTO THE SWORD and BREAKS FREE from the statue, just as... ...the PICK-UP PLOWS into the statue maze. Statues TUMBLE and CRUMBLE. As the dust clears, Medusa LOOKS AROUND angrily. She sees NO SIGN of Percy. She sees the iTouch, lying in the rubble. Medusa PICKS IT UP. She turns it around to the SHINY SIDE. She sees PERCY'S REFLECTION. He STANDING RIGHT BEHIND HER.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Add this to your playlist. Percy SWINGS THE SWORD. WHACK! Medusa's head GOES FLYING. It HITS the windshield of the truck and FALLS to the grou Grover and Annabeth GET OUT of the truck, TAKE OFF their blindfolds. Percy joins them and they see the HAIR-SNAKES DRAGGING Medusa's HEAD away, across the ground.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: That's something you don't see every day.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: We should take it with us.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: The head?! You're kidding.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Her eyes still work, dead or alive. Never know when something like that might come in handy.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (nods, to Grover) Gimmee' your jacket.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Your jacket. We need something to wrap it in. At least until we can get an ice bucket. Grover reluctantly gives Percy his jacket. Percy grabs th head, WRAPS IT UP. Percy TOSSES the head back to Grover, FUMBLES IT like a hot potato and TOSSES it to Annabeth.  54. She TOSSES IT into the back of the truck where it lands w a SQUISHY THUD. Percy holds up the PEARL for all to see.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: One down, two to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy opens the cash register, takes the cash and GOLD DRACHMAS .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Medusa's TRUCK peels out onto the highway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grover DRIVES. Percy and Annabeth are in front with him. Percy STUDIES the MAP. Annabeth holds the green pearl up the light.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: You think Luke could've warned us that Medusa was guarding this...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Maybe he didn't know.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: (glances to Percy) Where's the next location? On the map, the second address APPEARS...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Nashville. Grover NODS, FLOORS the gas. The Shocking Pink's "VENUS" BLASTS from the radio. DISSOLVE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annabeth and Percy are fast asleep (her head is on his shoulder). Grover's head is bobbing as he fights off slee The pick-up GLIDES into the on-coming lane of traffic. HEADLIGHTS shine on them and a car HOOOOOONKS! Grover jerks awake, sees the oncoming car, SCREAMS, and SWERVES BACK into the right lane. Percy and Annabeth JOLT AWAKE as the pick-up FISHTAILS in the shoulder, then gets back on the road. Grover is STARTLED, FREAKED.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We should stop for the night.  55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somewhere on the I-70 WEST heading toward Missouri. The Motel is located next to an INTERSTATE EXIT. The VACANCY LIGHT IS ON. The Pick-Up truck PULLS into the parking lot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cramped, dusty reception area. The MANAGER, a scrawny 7 year old, sits behind the desk. Grover, wearing his handi disguise, enters with Percy and Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We need a room.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: You got an I.D.? The manager stares them down SUSPICIOUSLY. Percy takes ou wad of cash, peels off five twenties. The Manager grabs a bill, holds it up, looks at it, then looks at Percy.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: The spittin' image.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy opens the door. They enter the small, MUSTY old roo There is one QUEEN bed. Grover's pockets are packed with countless vending machine SNACKS.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Only one bed.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: I'll sleep in the chair. Grover dumps out the pile of snacks onto the bed. He PLOP down in the chair, clicks on the TV and starts eating a Snickers' Bar, wrapper and all. Grover goes to the ADULT MOVIE PAY CHANNELS and makes a selection. Annabeth GRABS remote and TURNS OFF the TV. Grover GLARES at her.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: What?! I can't watch a movie?! Percy unwraps a Snickers, sits on the bed, looks to Annab

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Pretty big bed. Maybe we could both-- She throws a PILLOW at him.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Floor or bathtub. Your call.  56.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (sighs, stands) I'll get some ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy fills the sink with ICE and places Medusa's head in He has DUCT-TAPED HER EYES SHUT, so there is no danger of stoning themselves. Percy and Annabeth (she's wearing cot boxers and a T-shirt, ready for bed) both grimace at the head, its skin BLUISH, surrounded with FLOPPY DEAD SNAKES

dialogues.speaker: GROVER, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Percy! Get in here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy and Annabeth hurriedly enter. Grover, covered in crumbs, surrounded by half eaten junk food, finishes chug a COKE, then starts CHEWING ON THE CAN. He looks at Percy

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You're on TV. ON THE TV SCREEN: a NEWS ANCHOR sits at a desk, a school yearbook photo of PERCY is on the screen behind her.

dialogues.speaker: NEWS ANCHOR, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: ---and still no word on the disappearance of seventeen-year old Percy Jackson and his mother Sally. Gabe Ugliano, Sally's husband, maintains that the 17 year old Percy is behind the disappearance. Cut to: GABE, standing in front of his garage, being interviewed by a REPORTER.

dialogues.speaker: GABE, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Kid's been in trouble his whole life. A real loser. Percy watches the screen. Stoic. Annabeth looks at him sympathetically.

dialogues.speaker: GABE, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: I mean... What kind of deranged person kidnaps his own mother?

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Mr. Ugliano is offering a cash reward for any information on the whereabouts of his wife, son--

dialogues.speaker: GABE, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Step-son.  57.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Stepson.

dialogues.speaker: GABE, (ON TV)
dialogues.text: Kid's no blood relation to me. Percy looks away. Grover tries to lighten the situation.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Cool. You're a fugitive.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: This is going to complicate things. Percy doesn't respond. He stands, exits, SHUTTING the doo behind him. Annabeth and Grover exchange a CONCERNED look

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy SWIMS the length of the pool underwater, purging hi emotions. When he surfaces , Annabeth is standing there.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Nice work today, saving us from Medusa... Thanks. (extends her hand) Friends? Percy reaches up... and pulls Annabeth into the pool.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Mess with the son of Poseidon... you're gonna get wet. Annabeth splashes frantically, like she's drowning.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Can't... swim... Percy panics, reaches for her...and she leaps up and shov his head under the water. When he surfaces, she's LAUGHIN

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Mess with the daughter of Athena... you're gonna' get outsmarted every time.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Then I'm glad you're on my side. They exchange a warm smile.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: So... Why do our parents hate each other?  58.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: They both wanted to be Patron God of Athens. The people chose Athena. Poseidon was insulted. He cursed the city so they would never have enough water. Our parents have hated each other ever since.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: My old man sounds like a bigger jerk than my Stepfather.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I doubt that. Besides, that's the historical version... I think there was another reason your Father got so angry at my Mom...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Why's that?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: He had a huge crush on her. And she blew him off.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: How do you know it wasn't the other way around?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: You haven't met my Mom.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What's she like?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Intense. Always busy. The rare time we spend together, she criticizes everything I do, points out all my weaknesses... She says it's to make me stronger and wiser. But it only pisses me off. (rolls her eyes, smiles) She'd be furious if she knew I was helping you.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (playfully, a touch serious) So that's why you came... rebelling against Mommy... You want her to notice you, see how tough you are...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Maybe. A little. But I have other reasons too. They look deep into each other's eyes, intense attraction  59.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Like what? They slowly lean into each other, lips getting closer...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Like... Their lips are almost touching. Their kiss is INTERRUPTED by... A FLASHLIGHT BEAM, shining on them.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: What's goin' on here?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY /ANNABETH
dialogues.text: We're... just talking.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: No funny business in the pool. Get Out. Percy and Annabeth climb out, their moment gone. The mana walks away. The two share an awkward beat of silence.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I'm... I'm gonna' chill out here for a while. You can stay if you--

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Actually, I'm pretty tired. I think I'll call it a night. Goodnight, Percy. She gives him a peck on the cheek, walks away to the room Percy sighs. FRUSTRATED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy is ASLEEP. At the BOTTOM OF THE POOL. He opens his eyes, SWIMS to the surface and gets out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Manager pours himself a CUP OF COFFEE, accidentally spills some on the desk. He grabs a USA TODAY newspaper t sop up the mess. Percy's PHOTO is on the front page. The headline: "TEEN BOY STILL MISSING; WANTED FOR QUESTIONING He RECOGNIZES Percy, picks up the paper, examines it.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: The spittin' image.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annabeth is in bed, waking up. Grover walks out of the bathroom holding the MEDUSA HEAD by the snake-hair.  60.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Alright. Who put Medusa's head in the sink?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Manger is peaking in through a gap between the curtai He sees Grover HOLDING up the SEVERED MEDUSA HEAD. The Manager gags, holds back vomit. Terrified, he backs away from the window... and BUMPS right into... Percy.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Looking for something? The Manager, petrified, tries to speak.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: You... you... killed her... You killed your own mother. Percy, confused, sees the USA TODAY clutched in the Manag hand. Percy sees his photo on the front page, looks to th window, sees Grover, inside the room, holding Medusa's he The Manager pulls out a PISTOL, aims at Percy.

dialogues.speaker: MANAGER
dialogues.text: Murderer!

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No, I'm not... It's not what you think... The Manager BACKS AWAY, still holding the gun on Percy. Percy steps forward, trying to explain.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You got it all wrong... The Manager CLICKS the pistol. READY TO SHOOT. Percy clos his eyes, CONCENTRATES. The pool's water RIPPLES. A HUGE WAVE erupts over the side of the pool. The Manager LOOKS sees the wave RISE over the pool. It ENGULFS the Manager SWEEPS him down the street. Percy RACES BACK to the room.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Guys! We're checking out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Pick-up CRUISES on a two-lane blacktop highway. The weather is getting more OMINOUS. Dark CLOUDS. Heavy WINDS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is quiet, reflective. Annabeth is ASLEEP between Grover and Percy, her head on Percy's shoulder. He's look out the window, watching the landscape pass before his ey  61. Percy looks to Annabeth, resting peacefully on his should A small SMILE appears on Percy's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pick-up passes a sign that reads: WELCOME TO NASHVILL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pick-up truck pulls up. Percy. Grover and Annabeth st out. Percy wears sunglasses and a baseball cap, pulled do to conceal his identity. CAMERA PULLS BACK. We are in the middle of a LARGE PARK, crowded with people. Percy. Grove and Annabeth walk through the park, passing families on PICNICS, JOGGERS, STREET PERFORMERS, to stand before... THE PARTHENON. An exact DUPLICATE of the ancient Greek architecture, directly in the middle of a modern Nashville park. The juxtaposition of past and present is STRIKING. Percy, Gro and Annabeth examine the map, look up at the Parthenon.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: The second pearl. It's in there. Somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Wish Luke's map had been a little more specific than "Parthenon".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Filled with TOURISTS. Percy, Grover and Annabeth ENTER. T space is surrounded by imposing columns, housing a 41 FOO STATUE of the Goddess ATHENA. It's as if they've stepped back in time 4000 years. Annabeth, slightly moved, looks the statue. Percy notices the name ATHENA on the base of statue, turns to Annabeth...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Your Mom? Annabeth nods.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Does she really look like that?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Slight resemblance.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Nice rack.  62.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Excuse me?!

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Nothing. Hormones. Sorry. Percy's eyes WIDEN. He sees something OFFSCREEN.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Up there. Percy points to the TOP of the statue. Grover and Annabet look up. The SECOND GREEN PEARL is embedded in the middle Athena's crown, surrounded by rare, colorful JEWELS.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Too easy.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Not really. It's 40 feet in the air. The place is filled with tourists and security guards. Are we supposed to just jump up and grab it? Long pause. Percy smiles. AN IDEA.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Maybe. CLOSE-UP: A SHOE BOX. Percy's hands come into frame and open the box lid. Insid are the WINGED SHOES, given to Percy from Luke. CAMERA PU BACK. The three of them sit at a PICNIC TABLE in the park Percy PICKS UP the winged shoes, examines them.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Luke gave me these for a reason. Tonight, after closing hours... I'll sneak in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSED for the evening. The surrounding park is DESERTED, save for ONE SECURITY GUARD, who sits in a small booth, several feet from the Parthenon entrance. The guard is an acne faced, gawky 23 YEAR OLD REDNECK. HIDING in a tall section of bushes, Percy, Annabeth and Grover keep watch on the Parthenon. Percy takes off his SNEAKERS, replaces them with the WINGED SHOES. He stands, SHUFFLES, like a RUNNER preparing for a marathon. He look at Grover and Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Any idea how these things work?  63.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You break into a run, build up speed... Like a jet on a runway. But it takes a bit of-- Percy RUNS FORWARD, through the parking lot. He's MOVING FAST. Suddenly, he begins to LIFT OFF... Like a JET... Pe is PROPELLED TEN, FIFTEEN FEET in the air... Then... Percy FLIPS in mid-air. HEAD OVER HEELS. He FALLS STRAIGH to the ground. He LANDS HARD. On his BACK. SMACK!

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: --practice. Annabeth and Grover RUN to Percy, who struggles to his fe slightly SHAKEN. DAZED. The wind KNOCKED out of him.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Okay, okay... I can do this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GUARD sits in his booth, head buried in a copy of Car Driver magazine. High ABOVE, out of the guard's view, the SILHOUETTE of Percy FLIES across the moonlit sky. Percy SWERVES, BOUNCES... flying slightly ERRATICALLY. He starting to GAIN CONTROL, maintain his BALANCE...staying THE AIR. Percy MOVES FAST. Annabeth and Grover WATCH from the safety and cover of th BUSHES. Percy FLIES toward the Parthenon, SOARS through the colum

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy FLIES inside, moving QUICKLY. He SOARS toward the STATUE OF ATHENA. Percy's flying is getting a bit more CONFIDENT, SMOOTH... ANNABETH and GROVER watch from the bushes. NERVOUS. TENSE Percy FLIES directly toward Athena. He is MOVING FAST. He LOOKS DOWN at the shoes. A WORRIED LOOK covers his face. Grover, concerned, TURNS to Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: I forgot to teach him to slow down-- Percy CAN'T SLOW DOWN... INCHES from the ATHENA statue. He CRASHES into the statue.  64. The statue TILTS... BEGINS TO FALL... Percy FLIES BACK around, managing to STOP the statue from HITTING the floor. The statue TEETERS at a 45 degree angl Using all of his strength, Percy PUSHES the statue UPRIGH INTO PLACE. There is a small GRINDING SOUND as the statue FITS BACK onto its base. The guard LOOKS UP for a moment. Did he HEAR something? The guard SHRUGS to himself, GOES BACK to reading his magazine. Percy, SWEATING, NERVOUS... PERCHES on the statue's shoul Percy is TINY, compared to the large face of Athena, Moun Rushmore-like in its majestic grandeur. Percy LOOKS UP, sees the green pearl, the centerpiece of Athena's crown. Percy REACHES UP... he can only TOUCH the bottom of the statue's ear lobe. Percy begins to CLIMB UP onto the statue's earrings, TOWARD the top of her head. Annabeth and Grover watch in breathless ANTICIPATION. Percy CLIMBS UPWARD. The statue's surface is SMOOTH... SLIPPERY... Percy's foot SLIPS... He FALLS. Percy SAVES himself, GRABBING onto Athena's CROWN. Annabeth and Grover CATCH THEIR BREATH. Percy gets his footing, begins to CLIMB to the top of Athena's crown. From here, Percy is able to REACH OUT and TOUCH the green pearl. With some difficulty, Percy manages to REMOVE the pearl f the crown. He HOLDS it up, victoriously, for Annabeth and Grover to see.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: He did it.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Not quite. Grover points to the GUARD'S BOOTH. It's EMPTY. Inside the Parthenon, Percy puts the green pearl into his pocket. He is about to FLY AWAY... Suddenly INTERRUPTED..

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Get off the statue.  65. Percy looks down. The SECURITY GUARD stands below the statue. He holds a GUN, POINTED at Percy.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: (extends gun) Now. Percy CLIMBS DOWN the face of the statue. He LANDS on the floor, IN FRONT of the security guard. Percy RAISES his hands. The Security Guard GRINS.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: You look familiar.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: You're that kid. On the news. The one who killed his Mother.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You're thinking of somebody else...

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Naw... It's you. I remember the eyes.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Drop your gun. The Security Guard TURNS. Grover and Annabeth stand a few feet away. Annabeth is holding a BOW and ARROW, POINTED a the Security Guard, who chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: You think an arrow's gonna' stop me?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I'm an Olympian.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: I know who you are, daughter of Athena. Annabeth, Grover and Percy exchange a PUZZLED GLANCE. The Security Guard TURNS to Percy.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: I've been expecting you, Percy Jackson.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You know me?  66.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Just give me the lightning bolt. And I'll let you go.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I don't have it.

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: (sighs) I really hoped to avoid this... The Security Guard takes a DEEP BREATH... Then EXHALES... outer SKIN EXPLODES! SHOWERING the room with COUNTLESS FRAGMENTS. Percy, Annabeth and Grover HIDE their eyes. PIECES of the Security Guard FLY BY THEM. All that REMAINS of the security guard, is a thick, swirl PUFF OF SMOKE, on the floor. Percy, Annabeth and Grover slowly WALK to the smoke. They LOOK DOWN. The smoke BEGINS TO CLEAR... REVEALING... A REPTILIAN EYE. More SMOKE CLEARS. TWO EYES appear... Followed by THREE, FOUR... SIX, SEVEN... Percy, Annabeth and Grover STEP BACK. FOURTEEN EYES are revealed... On SEVEN different heads. T heads are REPTILIAN. VICIOUS. SNARLING. The heads RISE UP from the smoke, GROWING high above the kids' heads. The heads FULLY FORM into the GIANT, DRAGON- LIKE BODY of the seven headed...

dialogues.speaker: HYDRA
dialogues.text: Annabeth SHOOTS ARROWS at the Hydra. The stinging arrows only make the beast ANGRIER. Its monstrous heads SWOOP DO jaws SNAPPING at Annabeth and Grover. They dive behind th STONE COLUMNS for cover, setting off the ALARM. Percy REACHES into his backpack, pulls out Luke's SHIELD. Percy LEAPS ONTO one of the Hydra-heads. It tries to SHAK HIM OFF. The other Hydra-heads LURCH toward Percy, SNAPPI their fanged jaws. Percy TWISTS to avoid them. He REACHES into his pocket... removes his PEN and activates his SWOR  67. Another Hydra-head SWOOPS toward Percy. He swings the swo and DECAPITATES the head. It SPEWS thick GREEN BLOOD. The other six heads SCREAM in PAIN. Percy LEAPS onto another head, that THRASHES at him, RIPP AWAY a piece of Percy's shoulder. Another head SLASHES Percy's thigh. Another head goes for the jugular, moments before Percy manages to DECAPITATE IT.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Percy! Stop! You're only making it worse!

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?!

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: When you cut off one hydra head-- The TWO HEADLESS NECKS twist around as if they are starin Percy.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: --Three grow back! THREE MORE HEADS POP OUT of each of the necks! Now the Hy is a BEAST WITH ELEVEN HEADS! The heads SNAP at Percy, DRAWING MORE BLOOD. Percy LEAPS from one head... to another... to another and...gets HUNG by one of the fangs. It has RIPPED through his pant leg. Percy DANGLES helplessly, using his sword to keep the oth heads at bay. The Hydra-head FLIPS Percy up into its mouth. Percy is ST INSIDE the hydra's mouth. The beast BITES DOWN. Percy EXTENDS his shield. The hydra's FANGS strike down on the shield, LOCKING the creature's mouth OPEN. SAVING Percy. For a MOMENT. But Percy is TRAPPED, his shirt CAUGHT on t hydra's fangs. Annabeth FIRES MORE ARROWS at the heads, annoying and distracting them. Percy CAN'T BREAK FREE. Luke's shield is BENDING... ABOUT SNAP. The hydra fangs are ONLY INCHES from Percy's midsection. He's about to be BITTEN IN TWO. Annabeth continues to FIRE ARROWS. She CALLS to Grover.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Grover! Do something!  68. Grover LOOKS AROUND for some sort of WEAPON... He spots Percy's BACKPACK. An IDEA. Percy USES all of his strength to HOLD OPEN the Hydra mou But the creature is TOO STRONG. The hydra's MOUTH STARTS TO CLOSE... Its TEETH INCHES fro penetrating Percy's torso...

dialogues.speaker: GUYS
dialogues.text: Grover stands BEHIND them. He's UNWRAPPED the Medusa head He EXTENDS it forward. TOWARD the Hydra. Grover EXTENDS the Medusa head and RIPS THE TAPE OFF of Medusa's eyes... FACING the hydra... Hydra's eyes LOCK with Medusa's. The Hydra TURNS TO STONE. Annabeth's final arrows BOUNCE OFF the Hydra's stone body Percy KNOCKS OUT some of the hydra's stone teeth, to FREE HIMSELF from the beast's mouth. Percy grabs Luke's BENT SHIELD and LEAPS onto the stone Hydra neck. Percy SLIDES DOWN the neck, to the ground. Grover PUTS the tape back OVER Medusa's eyes, PLACES her back into the backpack, looks at Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You were right. She did come in handy. They turn, look back at the now STONE HYDRA. It FITS in quite nicely with the Parthenon's architecture. Percy removes the GREEN PEARL from his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Two down, one to go. Annabeth notices the burglar alarm BLARING from inside.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Let's get back to the truck... They hurriedly EXIT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Annabeth and Grover RUN to their truck. They are INTERRUPTED by a sound.  69.

dialogues.speaker: POLICE CAPTAIN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Raise your hands. Above your heads. They turn. THREE POLICE CARS SURROUND them. COPS AIM thei pistols at the kids. Percy, Annabeth and Grover RAISE their hands. Suddenly, there is a FAINT, DISTANT SOUND of a POWERFUL ENGINE. It grows LOUDER... LOUDER... A BLACK HUMVEE barrels through the crowd, SMASHES through police cars, and SKIDS to a STOP in front of the kids. Th license plate reads: "WARMNGR". The COPS FIRE their guns. The DRIVER rolls down his windo (think BRUCE WILLIS). He is dressed in LEATHER, adorned w MILITARY MEDALS from various eras. His face is angular, hard, with a strong jaw. His head is SHAVED. He wears a soul patch. This is ARES, GOD OF WAR. He lowers his aviat sunglasses, grins at Percy.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Your ride's here.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Ares?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: The God of War?!? As bullets FLY around them, Grover SHOUTS.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: I think we should get in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids JUMP in. Ares throws it into gear, lets out a WA WHOOP and drives straight at the POLICE LINE. They contin to FIRE on the Humvee. Bullets BOUNCE OFF the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ares PLOWS right through their barricade, and OUT OF THE PARK. POLICE CARS CHASE after the Humvee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ares CACKLES wildly, loves the chase.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Saving your ass.  70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POLICE CARS are in pursuit of the Humvee. Ares takes corn so fast that the Humvee TIPS ON TWO WHEELS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Grover, and Annabeth are FREAKED. SCARED.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: We're all gonna' die!

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Casualties of war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police cars are now coming at the Humvee from all sides.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Time to go stealth. Ares FLICKS a DASHBOARD SWITCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Humvee DISAPPEARS in the midst of the chase. It is no SHIMMERING SHAPE, camouflaged from the human eye. The Hum DRIVES OFF into the night. FREE. EXT. CHUCK’S DINER - NIGHT The Humvee pulls into Chuck's, a fifties style diner.

dialogues.speaker: ARES, (0.C.)
dialogues.text: Anybody hungry? We got a long drive ahead of us. Ares and the kids STEP OUT of the Humvee.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: They're gonna' be looking for this car. It's kinda'... unique... Ares CLICKS the auto-lock on his key-chain. The Humvee TRANSFORMS, into a 1970's blue VW HIPPIE VAN.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Not any more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A modest, family diner. The Turtles "Happy Together" play on the JUKEBOX. Ares enters.  71. As he passes the jukebox, we hear the 45 record SCRATCH. song CHANGES to Van Halen's "Runnin' With The Devil". Ares STRUTS down the restaurant aisle. Percy, Annabeth, a Grover are behind him. Ares walks by each booth, his mere presence EVOKES CALAMITY and TENSION. As Ares passes, bab CRY, people start to ARGUE... Ares sits in a BOOTH, at the back of the place. The kids JOIN HIM. With sudden TENSION in the air, the kids are fidgety, uncomfortable. The WAITRESS delivers the menus.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Thank you, ma'am. No menus. Four cheeseburgers. Rare.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I'm a vegetar--

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Four cheeseburgers. Rare! The waitress nods, walks away.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Why are you really here, Ares?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Chiron sent me.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: To bring you to Olympus.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We'll get there. We got time.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Not much. You checked out the weather recently?... The kids LOOK OUT the window. The sky above is filled wit swiftly MOVING BLACK CLOUDS. OMINOUS. THREATENING.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Every day it gets worse. That means Zeus and Poseidon are gearin' up for battle. Summer solstice is only ten days from now. And if the bolt isn’t returned to Zeus by then... It’s war.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I’m getting my Mom first.  72.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Kinda' selfish, kid... Putting your personal feelings over the fate of civilization...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Once Zeus finds out I'm not the Lightning Thief, word will spread fast. Then Hades will kill my Mother.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: True...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: So I need to save her first, then convince Zeus of my innocence.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Unfortunately, you don’t have much choice in the matter. You’re my prisoner now. The waitress ARRIVES with the burgers. Ares lifts the bur bun, examines the beef. He SNAPS at the waitress.

dialogues.speaker: ARES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I said RARE!

dialogues.speaker: WAITRESS
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I told them-- He SHOVES his plate into the waitress’ stomach, nearly KNOCKING the wind out of her. SCARED, she nods.

dialogues.speaker: WAITRESS
dialogues.text: I'll... get... another... one. The other customers are STARING. Ares turns, GLARES at th

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: What are you looking at! Get back to stuffin' your faces before I bash ‘em in! The patrons do as they're told. Ares LOOKS BACK to Percy, GRINS, as if nothing happened, speaks calmly.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: So if you aren't the Lightning Thief... Who is?...

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Hades?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: No way.  73.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: If Hades possesses the bolt and the son of Poseidon, he has all the power and leverage he needs to take over Olympus. I'll bet he's using Percy’s Mom to lure him into a trap.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Hades isn’t that bright. No... whoever took the bolt would be much more clever... someone who would want to start a war of the Gods... The kids look at Ares, accusingly.

dialogues.speaker: ARES, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh... Because I'm the God of War, I took it? WRONG! My business is all down here, on earth. And if you haven't noticed... it's booming right now.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Then who else would steal it?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Someone real clever... A master strategist... (turns to Annabeth) Like Athena.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: My Mom? Grover and Percy turn to Annabeth. ANNABETH (CONT’D) You think my mom is the thief!?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Mother, daughter, all the same. Maybe the real question is... why are you here? Grover is Percy's protector. But why did you come along? To keep an eye on these two? To get rid of all the loose ends?...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (furious, passionate) My mom doesn't start wars.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: First time for everything. The burly, badass, muscular owner, CHUCK, covered with tattoos, wearing a stained apron, drops the new burger pl in front of Ares. Chuck LEANS INTO into Ares' face.  74.

dialogues.speaker: CHUCK
dialogues.text: Next time you yell at my waitress and berate my customers, you're gonna' be wearin' your food. Got that, Rambo?

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: (calm) You're right. I'm sorry. That was uncalled for Then... WHACK! WHACK! In two quick PUNCHES, Ares SENDS Chuck falling to the floor, bleeding, writhing in PAIN. Ares unfolds some BILLS and drops them on the table. He grabs his burger, heads for the door, SHOVING the kids ah EXT. CHUCK's DINER - MOMENTS LATER - NIGHT Ares PUSHES the kids into the back of the van. Percy stop desperate, LOOKS at Ares.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Ares, please... Let me go... I gotta' try and save my Mom... It's my last chance...

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Sorry, kid. Can't do it. He SHOVES Percy into the car. Ares JUMPS into the driver' seat, starts the van and SPEEDS OUT of the parking lot. Percy stares out the window, DEPRESSED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ares DRIVES. Percy is SLUMPED forward, near tears. All of his hope... GONE. Annabeth exchanges a CONCERNED LOOK wit Grover. She pauses, gets an idea... LEANS FORWARD, to Are

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Ares...

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Did you ever stop and think about a war between the Gods?... It would be spectacular... The ultimate battle...

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: (pondering) Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Haven't you been waiting years for something like this?  75.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: (thinking, nods) Centuries.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Exactly. And look at us? Have you ever seen three such pathetic losers? Ares glances to the rearview mirror.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Do we really look like we can defeat Hades? I’m betting that we get killed on our little suicide mission. I'm betting we never even make it to Olympus, that Zeus never gets his bolt. And you know what that means...

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: (softly, eyes light) War.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: But if you take us to Olympus... Well, there won't be a war. Only...

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: (sadly, softly) Peace. Ares' eyes GLAZE OVER over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ares' van pulls up to the side of the tracks, located on deserted COUNTRY ROAD. The back door SLIDES OPEN. Percy, Annabeth and Grover GET OUT. Ares rolls down his window.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: I'll tell Chiron I couldn't find you. Percy nods, exchanges a hopeful look with Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: I'd wish you good luck... But your survival ain't exactly in my best interest... Ares CLOSES the window, DRIVES OFF. The van VANISHES in a ball of LIGHT and a SONIC BOOM. Grover WATCHES.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Sweet guy. Percy EMBRACES Annabeth.  76.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Just like your Mom. A master strategist. (sincere, passionate) Thank you so much. They lean forward, looks as if they're about to kiss... Grover CLEARS HIS THROAT.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Okay. Which way to the next pearl? Percy OPENS the map. The third location GLOWS: LAS VEGAS, NEVADA. LOTUS LAND CASINO. In the distance, we hear a TRAIN WHISTLE. Percy takes off along the railroad tracks, motions to Annabeth and Grover

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We got ten days to save my Mom. And the world. C'mon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Annabeth and Grover hurry along the tracks. A TRAI pulling BOX CARS rolls toward them. Percy CHECKS his map with a flashlight.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: This one's headed West. Percy starts RUNNING toward it. Annabeth and Grover FOLLO They RUN alongside the train. Percy LEAPS into one of the box cars, reaches out his hand and PULLS Annabeth in.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: C'mon, Grover! Grover RUNS ALONG the side of the train, plants his crutc like ski poles and LEAPS with a SINGLE BOUND. He FLIES RI INTO the box car.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: Grover LANDS. He gets to his feet. Percy and Annabeth are staring at something.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We got company. They are inside of a car filled with FARM ANIMALS. CHICKE COWS, GOATS...  77.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small FIRE burns in the middle of the box car. Grover, Percy and Annabeth are SEATED around it. The ANIMALS surround them.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (knows what he's thinking) Don't look at me like that.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Like what?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Like that.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You're being paranoid.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I know what you're thinking.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: No. Maybe. Okay. Crossed my mind. For a second.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What are you two talking about?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (angry) a Grover thinks my Mom is the Lightning Thief.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: No. Not totally. I mean, I wouldn't be surprised. She does hate Percy's Dad. And with a little help from you, she could cause Poseidon great pain... by hurting his son.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (furious) I wouldn't do anything to hurt Percy.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You almost killed him back at the Camp.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (getting upset) That was before...

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Before what?  78.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Before I-- Annabeth can't answer, too filled with emotion. Her eyes fill with tears. She glances at Percy, hurries to the sid of the train car, slides open the doors and CLIMBS OUTSID ONTO THE EXTERIOR LADDER.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Annabeth... Wait... Annabeth CLIMBS onto the roof of the train car. Percy, ANNOYED, turns to Grover.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Smooth.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: (shrugs) Hey, I'm your protector. I'm not supposed to trust anybody who gets close to you. Even her.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No wonder you have so much trouble with the opposite sex.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: (insulted, hurt) Uncalled for. Totally uncalled for. Percy turns, dashes outside and CLIMBS UP onto the boxcar roof. Grover STEAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WARM, ROMANTIC NIGHT. Annabeth sits on the moving train roof, looking up at the CLEAR NIGHT SKY, FILLED WITH BRIG STARS. She is CRYING. Percy walks up, sits beside her.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Hey. A pause. She turns to him,. He WIPES a tear from her chee

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Grover's right. I really didn't like you at first. I was a little jealous... competitive... But that's different now... Percy moves CLOSER to Annabeth, puts his arms around her.  79.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: The last few days have been the most exciting time of my life... and it's... (tenderly) All because of you. Their eyes LOCK. They share their FIRST KISS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grover, ALONE with the animals, tries to sleep on a pile straw, covering himself with burlap sack. Grover stares ahead, his face a map of FRUSTRATION and LONELINESS. A GO saunters up, LICKS HIS FACE. Grover MUMBLES to himself.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Percy's up there, probably hooking up with a beautiful girl. And I'm down here... (looks at the goat) ...with you. The goat continues to lick Grover's face. Grover smiles, WARMING UP to the goat's affection. Grover GIGGLES.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Stop it. He looks up at the goat, ponders...

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Ya' know... In this light, at just the right angle... you're sorta' cute... The goat KICKS Grover in the head and WALKS AWAY. Grover sits up. Angry. Insulted.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: What?! It's perfectly natural for me to have feelings for you. Well... (points to lower half) ..-half of me. The goat bleats. Grover PULLS the burlap sack over his he

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Good night!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The train PULLS into an old, ancient train station, alone the middle of the desert. There's nothing around for mile and miles, only DRY BARREN LAND and ROCKY PLATEAUS. The train COMES TO A STOP. On top of the boxcar, Annabeth lie in Percy's arms. They are ASLEEP.  80. Grover's head POPS up over the side of the boxcar top.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Hey. Romeo and Juliet. Percy and Annabeth wake up.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: End of the line. Percy and Annabeth CLIMB DOWN to the train platform. Grov gives them their backpacks.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: How far to Las Vegas?

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: (checks map) A long way.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: We can hitchhike. Percy looks to the edge of the platform. A SHERIFF'S CAR parked here.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Roads aren't safe.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: What are we supposed to do? Percy slings his backpack over his shoulder and grabs the shield. He takes off across the bleak DESERT TERRAIN.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You're gonna' walk all the way to Vegas!? Percy IGNORE him, keeps walking. Annabeth grabs her backpack, follows after Percy. Grover sighs, FOLLOWS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Grover, and Annabeth march across the scorching, shimmering desert landscape like young T.E. Lawrences. As the SUN beats down on them, they get SLOWER... DIRTIER... and more PARCHED. They have torn pieces of clothing wrapp around their heads for protection. Annabeth glares up at HOT SUN, sees BUZZARDS circling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun is SETTING. Covered in dust, grime and sweat, Per Annabeth and Grover have stopped to rest in the shade of ROCKY MESA. Annabeth holds an empty water bottle over her mouth, hoping for one more drop. She tosses it away.  81.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Empty. They continue walking. EXHAUSTED. DEFEATED. DISSOLVE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is BITTERLY COLD. Percy, Annabeth and Grover are hungr cold, filled with a sense of impending doom. They are HOVERED around a dying fire. Percy's arms are wrapped aro Annabeth, who has her arms wrapped around Grover. The 3 o them are SHIVERING.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: We're still a long way from Vegas... Without water, food... We're gonna' die out here... The kids exchange WORRIED looks. DISSOLVE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids are ASLEEP. Something APPROACHES. LARGE, MOVING SHADOWS fall over them. We hear SNORTING, the sound of HOOVES... Percy, Annabeth and Grover WAKE. They look up and see... A WILD HORSE. The animal STARES down at them. The kids LEAP up, a littl freaked. There are THREE WILD HORSES surrounding them. Percy, Grover and Annabeth stand. The horses are loaded w BASKETS OF FRESH FRUIT, VEGETABLES and canteens of WATER. Grover immediately runs to the basket, begins to STUFF hi face with the food. One of the horses makes a motion, LOWERS its head, beckon Percy. The horse BENDS one leg and KNEELS in front of Per

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: He wants you to get on. (smiles ) Guess it pays to have a Dad who's God of the horses. Percy smiles, grabs his BACKPACK and SHIELD. He CLIMBS on the horse. Once Percy is on, the horse RISES. The other t horses KNEEL in front of Annabeth and Grover. They CLIMB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Annabeth and Grover RIDE the horses, across the ro desert.  82. Percy and Annabeth are smiling, laughing, feeling free, ALIVE... leaving a trail of DUST. Grover is behind them, doing everything he can to HOLD ON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The horses are standing on a ROCKY PLATEAU. The kids are sitting on top of the horses, looking out over the glitte lights of LAS VEGAS. Percy checks his MAP. The sight of t final green pearl reads: Las Vegas... LOTUS LAND.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Las Vegas. Last stop before hell. As they ride down toward the city, we see DARK OMINOUS ST CLOUDS churning in the distance, moving WESTWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Grover, and Annabeth ride along the Vegas strip, o their horses. Shocked ONLOOKERS stare at these three kids horseback. Up ahead, is LOTUS LAND, a glittery, glamorous million-watt CASINO. It's designed as a huge NEON FLOWER, the petals LIGHTING UP and BLINKING. Percy, Annabeth and Grover ARRIVE at the entrance. The horses KNEEL. The kids HOP OFF. Grover is covered in dust walking bow legged, in tremendous PAIN.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Goat on a horse. Ain't natural. Countless Lotus Land VALETS descend upon them.

dialogues.speaker: VALET
dialogues.text: Welcome to Lotus Land. The Valets take the horses. The kids ENTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unlike any casino we've ever seen. A teenagers PARADISE. addition to the regular slots and casino games, there are hundreds of VIDEO GAMES, everything from classic PAC-MAN DANCE-DANCE REVOLUTION. The place is filled with KIDS and TEENAGERS. NO PARENTS o ADULTS (save for employees). There's something odd about kids... They are dressed in clothes and hairstyles from e decade, spanning the FIFTIES through the NINETIES. Percy, Annabeth, and Grover walk through the casino.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Where would you hide a green pearl? An eager, too friendly BELLHOP rushes up to them.  83.

dialogues.speaker: BELLHOP
dialogues.text: Welcome to Lotus Land. Hope you've had a pleasant journey. Here's your room key.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We're not staying. Just passing through.

dialogues.speaker: BELLHOP
dialogues.text: It's complimentary. Room 4001. Take the elevator to the top.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No, really-- The PERSISTENT Bellhop hands them each a GREEN PLASTIC CA

dialogues.speaker: BELLHOP
dialogues.text: Your complimentary Lotus-Cash cards. Good for everything in the hotel and casino. Your expense accounts are unlimited and you never have to pay us back. The Bellhop scurries away, kids exchange PUZZLED glances. Percy looks at the Green card, ANNOYED.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Think the guy could take a hint-- A CLUB WAITRESS approaches, holding a tray of LOTUS FLOWE

dialogues.speaker: CLUB WAITRESS
dialogues.text: Flowers? Percy takes one, SNIFFS it.

dialogues.speaker: CLUB WAITRESS
dialogues.text: They're edible. Percy and Annabeth each EAT a flower. Very TASTY. Grover takes a handful and SHOVES them in his mouth, CHEWS.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Delicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Annabeth, and Grover enter a PALATIAL SUITE. It ha three separate bedrooms, a bar stocked with candy, soda, chips. A huge plasma TV, sunken lounge area filled with pillows and beanbag chairs, a huge INDOOR SWIMMING POOL. The kids are IMPRESSED. They immediately start checking o the pad. Grover hits the bar, opens the refrigerator. It FILLED with food. The inside of the fridge appears to go for ETERNITY...  84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annabeth opens a CLOSET in one of the rooms. It is filled with the latest DESIGNER DRESSES and SHOES. A young girl' DREAM. Annabeth is amazed, takes out a dress, holds it against her body. She looks at shoes... STUNNED...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: They're all my size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy is standing in front of another closet. It is fille with a variety of clothes, all his size: SUITS, TUXEDOS, JEANS, T-SHIRTS, NIKES... Percy smiles. Annabeth runs int Percy's room, followed by Grover.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Let's go out tonight... have some fun.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Wish we could. But we're on a time- sensitive mission. Remember?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: We are?... What mission? Percy PAUSES, he has to think about it... He CAN'T RECALL

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Good question. I can't remember. Grover, why are we here?

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: I don't know... (shrugs) To have fun?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Right. Have fun. That's it. Okay. So let's have some fun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DISCO BALL spins. COLORED LIGHTS flash. DANCE MUSIC plays. DRY ICE MIST covers the floor. Percy, Annabeth, an Grover enter. They look incredibly STYLISH. Percy wears a sleek, stylish black tuxedo, Annabeth is in a gorgeous ballroom gown, Grover is in tails and a top hat. A 70's Dance classic fills the disco. Percy EXTENDS his h to Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: May I have this dance?  85. They step on the dance floor, immediately find their groo A group of GORGEOUS WOMEN walk up to Grover, drag him ont the dance floor. Percy and Annabeth look into each other's eyes, very much LOVE. They KISS.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Let's stay here forever.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Why not? They kiss again. It is INTERRUPTED by the sounds of SHOUT and APPLAUDING. They look up and see... GROVER, in the middle of the dance floor. He is surrounde by kids, watching his manic, wildly energetic DANCE. The girls love him. During his dance, Grover RIPS OFF pants, exposing his goat lower half. Grover finishes with some s stopping BREAK DANCE MOVES. Percy and Annabeth laugh, look to each other and share another DEEP KISS. DISSOLVE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Annabeth, and Grover are having fun at Lotus Land. Percy and Annabeth are INSEPARABLE. They drive MINI-SPORT CARS throughout the casino, play POKER and BLACKJACK, ord table full of DESSERTS at a restaurant. Grover struts through the casino with a bevy of scantily BEAUTIES, gambling at each of the tables with them. He WI EVERY GAME that he plays. At one point, Percy and Annabeth pass a SEVENTIES KID pla a vintage PINBALL MACHINE. Percy accidentally BUMPS the k

dialogues.speaker: SEVENTIES KID
dialogues.text: Hey! You just cost me the high score.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Sorry. My bad.

dialogues.speaker: SEVENTIES KID
dialogues.text: Your what? Percy examines the kid, who is wearing striped bell-botto a pristine STAR WARS T-shirt and a bushy seventies fro.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: How long have you been here?  86.

dialogues.speaker: SEVENTIES KID
dialogues.text: Couple weeks. Groovy place.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Groovy?... What year is it? The Seventies kid pauses, has to THINK for a moment.
Percy is stunned, worried... He rubs his temples, hearing DEEP VOICE inside his head...

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Percy... Wake up... Focus, focus... Percy walks over to a mullet-haired EIGHTIES KID, wearing parachute pants and a red and black leather jacket. The k is playing DONKEY KONG.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Excuse me. What year is it!?

dialogues.speaker: EIGHTIES KID
dialogues.text: Check out my most excellent score. Intense, Percy grabs the Eighties kid by the collar.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What year?!

dialogues.speaker: EIGHTIES KID
dialogues.text: Relax, dude... It's 1985, not the end of the world. Percy FREEZES, looks around at all of the kids. Every sin one of them is stuck at a specific time, IN THE PAST. A VOICE in Percy's head ECHOES...

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Percy... You need to get outside...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (to himself) Something... isn't... right... Percy shakes his head, like he's COMING OUT OF A TRANCE. turns, standing beside a supersize ROULETTE WHEEL. He notices something. The ball in the wheel, is... The third GREEN PEARL. Percy stares at the pearl, trying to figure out why it me so much to him. The ancient CROUPIER gives Percy a menaci suspicious look.  87.

dialogues.speaker: CROUPIER
dialogues.text: Enjoying your stay?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Fine. Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: CROUPIER
dialogues.text: Fine? Just... fine?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I mean... excellent. Fantastic. We want to stay forever. Percy starts to BACK AWAY, but the Croupier GRABS him. Pe breaks free. The Croupier speaks into his EAR-MIC.

dialogues.speaker: CROUPIER
dialogues.text: Percy Jackson's awake. Percy LOOKS at Annabeth...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Go upstairs. I'll meet you there.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: What? But why--

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (desperate) Please. Just do it. Annabeth nods, hurries off. Percy turns, sees a GROUP OF LOTUS EATERS heading toward Percy RUNS OFF, PUSHES his way through the crowd. He leap across the gambling tables, makes it to the Roulette whee and SNATCHES the THIRD GREEN PEARL. He LEAPS OFF the table, runs to the glass elevators. The Lotus Eaters are in HOT PURSUIT. Percy gets in just BEFOR THE DOORS CLOSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy BARGES IN. Grover is surrounded by a pile of food wrappers, several YOUNG HOT WOMEN, playing a video-game. Annabeth is sipping a drink, munching on Lotus flowers. Percy is TENSE, URGENT.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We have to go! Now!

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Chill. We'll go tomorrow.  88.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Or the next day. Percy GRABS Annabeth and Grover and THROWS them both into room's SWIMMING POOL. They POP UP out of the water. SHOCKED. AWAKE. ANGRY.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Hey... Why'd you do that?!

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You both need to wake up! You're in some kind of trance... I was too... Now listen to me. Focus. We're trapped. In the Land of Lotus Eaters.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Trapped? But we just got here last night...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (coming out of it) Lotus Eaters... Right... a cult that lives off of the Lotus flower. When you eat a flower, it induces the appearance of eternal youth and forgetfulness... makes you lose your desire to ever leave...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: And we gotta' leave now. Or we'll be stuck here forever. They hurriedly pack up their gear. Percy gathers up his stuff, shoving it in his back pack. He grabs his pen and shield. The kids HURRIEDLY EXIT. Grover blows ONE LAST KI to the bevy of beauties.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Grover and Annabeth RACE across the floor. Lotus- Eaters SWARM after them. Percy removes his pen, CLICKS IT It becomes the SWORD! Percy starts HACKING his way through the Lotus-Eaters. A YOUNG MAN in fifties clothes is hit with the sword. He suddenly AGES, turning to a withered OLD MAN before dropp to the floor. Grover sees a NEW LOTUS ELAN CONVERTIBLE on a rotating platform. A sign reads, "One Lucky Winner Drives Me Home.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Wheels.  89. They RACE to the car, JUMP UP onto the platform. Percy FE OFF the Lotus-Eaters while Grover HOT WIRES the car. It STARTS. Percy and Annabeth FALL into their seats as Grover FLOORS it. The car SAILS OFF the platform, through the casino, and CRASHES through the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car FLIES through the entrance and DRIVES OFF INTO TH NIGHT. SEVERAL YOUNG LOTUS EATERS run outside. The moment they leave the casino, their bodies AGE SEVERAL YEARS. They WA Percy's car DRIVE AWAY. The Lotus Eaters TURN and GO BACK INSIDE. As they pass back through the casino entrance, th bodies RETURN to their YOUTHFUL STATE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sky is covered with DARK, CHURNING STORM CLOUDS. The wind is BLOWING FIERCELY, scattering DEBRIS. The Lotus El SPEEDS along the middle of the Vegas strip. A NEWSPAPER blows onto the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grover WEAVES in and out of traffic, trying to see as Annabeth grabs the NEWS PAPER. She LOOKS AT the date.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: It's June 20th. Percy GRABS the paper, looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We were in there a week! ?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Felt like a day.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: June 20th... That means... tomorrow is... the Summer Solstice.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Actually midnight. Tonight.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: So how do we get to Hades? Percy opens THE MAP, revealing the GLOWING LOCATION OF HA It reads: LOS ANGELES. Beside it, is a sketch of THE HOLLYWOOD SIGN  90. Grover SLAMS his foot on the gas. The Lotus SPEEDS down t strip... OVER 100 MPH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traffic is BUMPER-TO-BUMPER on the 110 north through downtown. In the midst of traffic, is the Lotus convertib

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Grover and Annabeth are NERVOUS. WORRIED. Grover studies the map. The radio PLAYS.

dialogues.speaker: RADIO NEWSCASTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Scientists are baffled by what now appears to be a single storm cloud that has expanded to cover the entire United States. Hurricanes are building in the gulf, savage waves along the country's coast lines are endangering levees...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (worried, looking at the sky) Zeus and Poseidon... Preparing for battle...

dialogues.speaker: RADIO NEWSCASTER
dialogues.text: In other news, wanted kidnapper and suspected terrorist, 17 year old Percy Jackson is still at large.... Grover TURNS OFF the radio. Annabeth rolls down the windo sees a clock on a building. It reads: 12:47 PM.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Never thought I'd be late getting to hell because of traffic. Percy pauses, something deep inside is TROUBLING HIM. An expression of DOUBT and WEAKNESS covers his face.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Look, guys... Maybe it's time... time to stop.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Ares was right. Maybe I am being selfish. I mean... we've got less than twelve hours to stop the war. We should go straight to Olympus.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: What about your Mom?  91.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (defeated) We've done everything we can...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (snaps at him) Stop thinking like a mortal.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (tough, passionate, strong) I didn't come all this way to quit. We can do this, Percy. We can save your Mom and still stop the war. But you can't stop believing in yourself. You've come too far. Get those weak human thoughts out of your head... and start acting like a Demigod. Percy nods, he'll go forward. Grover checks the MAP.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: We're almost there. There's our exit. Outside, a green exit sign reads: "RIGHT LANE... HOLLYWOO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The world famous Hollywood sign. The Lotus Elan slides in a PARKING SPOT, several feet below the sign. Percy and th kids get out of the car, RUN UP THE STAIRS, toward the HOLLYWOOD SIGN. Percy checks his MAP, looks up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE HOLLYWOOD SIGN. The words begin to re-arrange themselves. The "YWOOD" section of the sign FADES AWAY. T "O" morphs into an "E". The sign now reads: HELL.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: You're sure the entrance is here?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Positive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Grover, and Annabeth hurriedly CLIMB to an area directly below the sign. They are DWARFED by the letters. They look around, cautiously. On the lower half of the letter "H", there is a section of COLORFUL GRAFFITI, a mixture of street and gang symbols.  92. Percy looks closely at the graffiti. It's actually GREEK LETTERS. As he stares at them they take shape so that we recognize them:

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: "Abandon all hope, ye who enter here." Percy reaches out and GENTLY TOUCHES the "H" surface. The is a LOUD CREAKING SOUND. The "H" SPINS, like a REVOLVING DOOR, sending Percy, Annabeth and Grover INSIDE the sign.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The revolving "H" STOPS, TRANSPORTING the kids into a cramped, dark room, CARVED into the grassy, muddy earth. Grover pulls out a pack of matches, LIGHTS ONE. This ILLUMINATES the three kids and the FACE of VIRGIL. He is tall, bone thin, with long, grey hair, piercing eye and a haunted, tragic expression. His skin is pale, with blue tint. He is dressed in flowing DARK ROBES. SURPRISED by Virgil's appearance, the kids JUMP BACK.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: The angel of death! A tiny smile appears on Virgil's face.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: Nothing so sinister, I'm afraid. I'm Virgil. Guide of the underworld. (looks at them) The living are not permitted here.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I need to see Hades.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: Die and come back. Virgil turns, moving back into the DARKNESS.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We'll pay you. Virgil pauses, EXTENDS his hand. Grover puts all their ca in the palm. It instantly INCINERATES. Virgil TURNS AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Wait...  93. Percy pulls out the GOLD DRACHMAS he stole from Medusa's emporium, DROPS them into Virgil's hand. Virgil examines ancient drachmas and smiles. Suddenly, the "H" SPINS AGAIN, REVOLVING Percy, Annabeth Grover OUT OF THE ROOM...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The REVOLVING "H" stops. The kids are now BACK OUTSIDE.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: He tricked us.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Not exactly-- They turn, now overlooking the UNDERWORLD, the dark, ALTERNATIVE UNIVERSE of Los Angeles. The expansive view o Hollywood has changed dramatically, a POST-APOCALYPTIC vi of the sunny, green landscape. Scattered FIRES RAGE throughout the hills. BLACK SMOKE ri from varied spots, SWIRLING into the BLOOD RED SKY. Homes and buildings are burnt out, smoking, VACANT. Cars BURN, many just skeletal FRAMES. The streets of are filled with hundreds of SOULS OF THE DEPARTED. They are white, ZOMBIE-LIKE figures, wandering aimlessly through the city. The Souls are dressed in tattered, dirty clothes, like homeless spectres. The soun of their painful WAILING and MOANS echo through the air. Virgil APPEARS, beside Percy, Grover and Annabeth, who st in horror at the sight before them.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: Welcome to the underworld. Virgil extends a TORCH.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: I'll take you to Hades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Virgil leads the kids through the streets, making their w through BURNT OUT cars, carcasses of DEAD ANIMALS and cro of WANDERING SOULS. Percy is ARMED with his shield and SWORD. Annabeth holds her BOW and ARROW. Grover clutches his DAGGER. As the kids PASS, the souls TOUCH them, GRAB their hands, PULL their hair...  94.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: Souls of the recently departed, waiting to find out what level of the underworld they'll be sent to... They are harmless. When they sense a living person, they touch them... It's comforting, reminds them of life's warmth. One of the souls CARESSES Grover's cheek. He is REVOLTED.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Ewwww... Sooo cold...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Virgil leads Annabeth, Percy and Grover to the entrance o Hades' home, a huge, ratty, dilapidated MANSION, surround by RUSTED IRON GATES. The facade is CRUMBLING, filled wit CRACKS. Windows are BROKEN. Horrible sounds of SCREAMING and INHUMAN GROWLING echo from inside the mansion. Virgil removes a rusty RING OF KEYS, finds one and OPENS the gat

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: We'll find Hades inside. The kids step through the gate. The Souls of the Departed try to follow, Virgil KEEPS them back, CLOSING the gates. Virgil leads Percy, Grover and Annabeth through the overg lawn, toward the FRONT DOOR. There is a GROWLING SOUND. A few feet away, TWO HELLHOUNDS feast on the carcass of a DEAD ANIMAL. They LOOK UP, seeing Percy. The Hellhounds MOVE TOWARD Percy. He EXTENDS his sword. The hellhounds RETRACT, staying back, not taking their eyes off of the k Virgil leads Percy. Annabeth and Grover onto the crumblin stone porch, toward the ROTTING FRONT DOOR. The rusted br KNOCKER is shaped like a LARGE EAGLE. Percy REACHES UP to knock. Virgil TRIES to stop him...

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: That's-- But Percy GRABS the knocker anyway. The BRASS EAGLE COMES LIFE, SCREECHES and BITES Percy's HAND. Percy LEAPS BACK, his hand BLOODIED. He LOOKS to the door. The knocker is BACK TO NORMAL.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: --not a good idea. Percy WIPES the blood from his hand. Virgil removes ANOTH KEY and OPENS the door. Virgil GLARES at Percy.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: I'm the guide. Remember?  95. Percy nods. They ENTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy, Annabeth and Grover ENTER. They are in a gigantic hallway, flanked by a TWISTING STAIRCASE. Furniture and lighting fixtures are covered in mounds of DUST and COBWE RATS play on the floor, scattered SPIDERS and LIZARDS cra along the walls. Floorboards, sections of the staircase.. are ROTTED AWAY. Grover STEPS onto a rotted section of the floor. It BREAK AWAY. Grover FALLS, GRABBING onto the edge. BELOW HIM, is large BASEMENT, filled with angry, hungry LOST SOULS. The are very DIFFERENT creatures from the lost souls in the streets. They are VICIOUS. DEADLY. They GRAB and CLAW at Grover's legs, trying to PULL HIM DOWN BELOW. Grover KICKS and SCREAMS, managing to KNOCK a few of them away. Percy and Annabeth PULL at Grover, trying to SAVE H Finally, they PULL HIM to safety.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You said they were harmless!

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: These are the lost souls, already condemned to eternal damnation. Very angry. And quite dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: No shit. A LOUD, BOOMING VOICE ECHOES through the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: HADES, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Who dares enter my home?!?

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: It's Virgil... I bring visitors.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Who?!

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Percy Jackson. Son of Poseidon.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: (pause, calm) Nephew. I've been expecting you. Virgil leads the kids into another room, toward the SOUND Hades' VOICE...  96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA PANS ALONG a long DINING ROOM TABLE, covered with ABUNDANCE OF FOOD... CAKES, ROASTS, VEGETABLES... All are ROTTING... Covered in COBWEBS, MAGGOTS and DUST. CAMERA CRANES BACK. We are inside of Hades elaborate, decaying dining/sitting room. Two large, tattered LEATHER CHAIRS face an enormous STONE FIREPLACE. A ROARING FIRE is inside. From here, we see th SHAPES of WRITHING, SCREAMING BODIES. Their muffled SCREAMS are hea Sitting in one chair, watching the screaming souls, is PERSEPHONE, Hades' wife. She is dressed in black with lon dark hair. Her beauty is MASKED by pale skin, Goth make-u black lipstick, etc. She is bored, miserable, TRAPPED. Sh sips a glass of red wine. HADES is in the other chair. He is pale, rail-thin, with long dark hair, dressed like a ROCKER in leather, skull r and boots. (Russel Brand meets Keith Richards). Hades hol a near empty bottle of wine. A GLOBE, made up of human bones, flickering with an INNER GOLDEN LIGHT, rests on a pedestal beside Hades. Percy, Annabeth and Grover enter, led by Virgil. Persepho glances up first, SEES the kids. She FOCUSES on Grover. T satyr notices her, is immediately ATTRACTED to her. Grove smiles, raises an eyebrow. They exchange a SEDUCTIVE look Virgil CLEARS his throat.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: Excuse me. Lord Hades, sir... Hades TURNS, looks at the kids. He STANDS, walks to them.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: You're Hades?

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Would you prefer I look like -- Hades instantly TRANSFORMS into a HORRIFIC TEN-FOOT HIGH, FLAMING-WINGED DEMON GOD. He gets RIGHT IN Annabeth's fac

dialogues.speaker: -- THIS
dialogues.text: The kids are FREAKED, even Virgil is terrified. Hades returns to NORMAL. Virgil NERVOUSLY backs out of the room  97.

dialogues.speaker: VIRGIL
dialogues.text: Well... It appears that my services are no longer needed... Good luck, Mr. Jackson. Enjoy your stay. Virgil practically STUMBLES over himself, RUNNING OUT of room. Hades RAISES AN EYEBROW to Percy.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: You are brave to come here, nephew... I can see the disgust in your eyes... Disgust for my world, for what I have become. But this was not my choice. I was banished here by Zeus and your Father. And they have succeeded in making my life a.... (irony not lost) Living hell. (points to food) Do you know what it's like to be me? Every feeling has been taken away. I feel no joy, I feel no pain. I am hungry, but I cannot taste. I am tired, but I cannot sleep. (looks at Persephone) I am in love. But I can never fulfill my desire. Persephone turns away. Hades points to the screaming, writhing souls that SCREAM from his fireplace.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: The only pleasure in my life, is human suffering. When others feel pain, when others experience hurt and tragedy... I feel total and complete joy. I feed on misery. (a beat) I am damned to this existence. And my only chance of getting out of here, is by defeating my brothers, and taking control of Olympus. But... (extends hand to Percy) I need the bolt.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (eyes burning) And I need my Mother.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Give me the bolt. And you will see her again.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I'm not the Lightning Thief. I don't have the bolt. I never did.  98.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Do you take me for a fool? Percy holds up his SHIELD and SWORD for protection.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Give it to me... or say goodbye to your Mother. Hades turns, GRABS the human bone globe from its pedestal THROWS it onto the ground, directly in front of Percy. Th globe EXPLODES, and there, frozen in a SHOWER OF GOLD, ju as she was when the Minotaur was about to kill her, is Percy's mom. UNCONSCIOUS. The shower of light DISSIPATES. Percy's mom WAKES, sits up, sees her son.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: Percy? Percy's eyes fill with TEARS. He drops his shield and swo RUNS to Sally. She looks into her son's eyes, smiles warm They EMBRACE. Annabeth and Grover are touched. Even Hades wife, Persephone, is MOVED. Percy LOOKS at his Mother.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Thought I lost you forever. Sally LOOKS AROUND at her surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: Are we dead?

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Not yet. But we're working on it. Hades SEES something OFFSCREEN, that catches his attentio Percy's SHIELD. It lies FACE DOWN. The handle appears to GLOWING. SURGING with LIGHT. Hades walks up to the shield, PICKS it up. Hades RIPS the golden handle from the shield. The handle TRANSFORMS into long clear cylinder, filled with surging, white LIGHTNING

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Zeus' master bolt. (to Percy) You lied.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: That wasn't my shield...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Luke gave it to him-- (a realization) We were set-up.  99.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Luke was the Lightning Thief.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
