dialogues.text: (looks to the bolt) Now... I can become King of the Gods. Hades turns to Persephone.

dialogues.speaker: HADES
dialogues.text: Take their weapons. Feed them to Kronos. Persephone nods. She stands, takes Percy's sword and shie Grover's dagger, Annabeth's bow and arrow. She LEADS Perc Sally, Annabeth and Grover out of the room. Persephone ma eye contact with Grover, still sharing an intense ATTRACT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An enormous CELLAR, with towering vaulted brick ceilings a series of tunnels that stretch into DARKNESS. The walls are DRIPPING WET. Percy, Annabeth, Sally and Grover STAND the middle of the cellar.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I never would have suspected Luke...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: But why did he hide the bolt in his shield? Why did he give it to me?

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Add that to the long list of things I'll never know. Like the feeling of a naked woman... or the sweet smell of-- There is a LOUD GRINDING SOUND. In the middle of the ston floor, BRICKS SEPARATE... The floor begins to SLIDE OPEN. revealing a deep PIT... Inside, there is... A WHIRLPOOL OF FIRE. From deep in the pit, within the flames, something STIRS. It ROARS... Then SCREAMS. Everyone RUNS to the side of the cellar, CLUTCHING the wa for dear life. The floor continues to SLIDE OPEN, reveali the waiting FLAMES directly beneath them... A GIANT, DEMON-LIKE FACE, made entirely of flames, APPEAR the whirlpool.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What's that?  100.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Kronos. Father of the Gods. Technically, your Grandfather.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: My Grandfather?

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: You, my friend, are the proud member of a very dysfunctional family. (a beat) Think your old man was a Deadbeat Dad?... At least he didn't eat his kids. The face of Kronos ROARS. The floor CONTINUES TO SLIDE OPEN...

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: (nervously) Or his grandkids. Only a FEW FEET OF FLOOR REMAIN. Grover and Sally CLUTCH the walls for dear life. Annabeth WRAPS her arms around Percy, holds him tight, WHISPERS in his ear.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: A sonnet... from ancient Greece... (softly) He is more than a hero. (through tears) He is a god in my eyes. The floor continues to OPEN... INCHES AWAY from everyone falling to their deaths... Annabeth and Percy SHARE A FINAL KISS... MOMENTS from dea Sally WITNESSES this, sees that her son has FOUND LOVE. Suddenly... the floor STOPS OPENING. Everyone EXCHANGES a puzzled look, HOLDING ONTO the tiny ledge of rock. The ROARING, FLAMING FACE OF KRONOS screams from below... The floor BEGINS TO CLOSE. The kids and Sally look bewildered, as the FLOORS CLOSES BELOW them, much to the dismay of a SCREAMING KRONOS. A HOODED FIGURE appears, RACING DOWN the stairs, toward Percy, Sally, Annabeth and Grover. The figure REMOVES its hood. It's...

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Persephone?!

dialogues.speaker: PERSEPHONE
dialogues.text: Follow me.  101. INT. HADES' PALACE —- HALLWAY - MOMENTS LATER Persephone is returning the kids' gear, handing Annabeth bow and arrow, Percy his sword and shield, Grover his dag Persephone gives Percy ZEUS' BOLT.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Why did you save us?

dialogues.speaker: PERSEPHONE
dialogues.text: Hades has been cruel and abusive... forcing me into a loveless marriage. Like your Mother, I was abducted by Hades. I agreed to be his wife, only if he would allow me to return to the surface for three months each year. It's all that I have to look forward to. A war of the Gods will destroy everything I hold dear in the mortal world...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We'll do everything we can to stop it. Persephone nods, smiles. She looks at them.

dialogues.speaker: PERSEPHONE
dialogues.text: You have the pearls? Grover removes the THREE GREEN PEARLS from his backpack.

dialogues.speaker: PERSEPHONE
dialogues.text: Only three. (Grover nods) One of you will have to stay behind.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: PERSEPHONE
dialogues.text: Each pearl protects only a single person. Whoever's blood touches it. The kids look at each other, unaware of that.

dialogues.speaker: PERSEPHONE
dialogues.text: Make your choice quickly. Sally turns to Percy.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: I'll stay. You're young, you have your whole life ahead of you... You need to experience it-- Percy TAKES Grover's dagger, quickly GRABS his mom's hand makes a slight CUT on her finger...  102.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: Percy!-- A drop of Sally's BLOOD trickles onto one of the pearls. Percy gives the bloody pearl to her. Percy then REACHES f Annabeth's hand. She RETRACTS her hand.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Don't even think about it. You go with your mom.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You three are going. I'm staying.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Percy. There's--

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No time to argue. You have to get Zeus's bolt back to Olympus. He GRABS Annabeth's hand. She spins, KICKS the dagger out Percy's hand. As Annabeth reaches for it, Percy activates Riptide and SWINGS, making a SHALLOW CUT across her arm. blood DRIPS to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: No! Percy ROLLS the pearl in Annabeth's blood, hands it to he

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Take care of my mom. And... (whispers to her) Stay safe. I'll never forget you. She nods, eyes TEARY. Percy TURNS to Grover.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Give me your hand.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: I'm not letting you stay.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Give me your hand! Grover reluctantly HOLDS OUT his hand. Just as Percy is about to CUT Grover's hand... Hades ENTERS.

dialogues.speaker: WHERE IS THE BOLT
dialogues.text: Hades immediately TRANSFORMS INTO DEMONIC FORM.  103. In that instance, Grover quickly SINKS HIS TEETH into Per arm, DRAWING BLOOD.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Ouuchh! Grover GRABS the third pearl, DRIPS Percy's blood onto it

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: I'm the protector. Not you. Hades RACES toward Percy. He extends his sword, SWINGING WILDLY. Percy's sword PIERCES Hades' chest. The wound is DEEP. Hades is SENT to the floor. BLACK blood pours from his wound. Hades, WRITHING in pain, REVERTS to his human self Percy LOOKS BACK to the others.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Break the pearls! Annabeth and Sally SMASH THE PEARLS on the ground. They EXPLODE in a green flash, ENVELOPING Sally and Annabeth i separate GREEN SPHERE. Each sphere begins to FLOAT OFF off the floor. Percy CRUSHES the remaining green pearl in his hand. He i suddenly ENVELOPED in the sphere. Percy LOOKS to Grover.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: It was an honor protecting you. Get the bolt to Olympus. You're our only hope.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I will. And then I'll get you out of here. I promise. Grover exchanges a lustful smile with Persephone.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Take your time. Percy FLOATS AWAY with the others. Grover looks to Hades, badly WOUNDED on the floor. A HAND REACHES OUT and GRABS him. It's PERSEPHONE. She LEADS Grover OUT of the house. The three green orbs RISE UP. Percy calls to the others.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: We need to concentrate, focus on where we're going... (a beat) To Olympus.  104. The three orbs PASS THROUGH the roof of the mansion...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Empire State Building is adorned with red, white and lights. Dark, ominous STORM CLOUDS are in the sky. There THUNDER. The few pedestrians on the streets, struggle to walk against the STRONG WIND. It's OMINOUS, EERIE, like t world is about to end... THREE GREEN ORBS carrying Percy, Annabeth and Sally, rise through the street directly in front of the Empire State Building. The orbs DISSOLVE. Percy looks around, confused

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: This isn't Olympus. It's New York City.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: The entrance to Olympus is in there.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: The Empire State Building?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (nods ) A secret elevator. Top floor. Percy glances to a clock on a nearby building: 11:43 PM.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Seventeen minutes 'til the war begins. Let's move! Percy removes the lightning bolt CYLINDER from his backpa clutching it tightly. Annabeth, Percy and Sally HURRY to entrance doors. A FAMILIAR VOICE calls out to them...

dialogues.speaker: LUKE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Percy! Give me the bolt! They all STOP, TURN UPWARD, to the direction of the voice It's LUKE. He is dressed in FULL ARMOR, holding a LONG, SHARP SWORD. Luke HOVERS several feet above them, wearing his own... v cool, very sleek... WINGED SHOES.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Luke... Why did you steal Zeus' bolt?

dialogues.speaker: LUKE
dialogues.text: To start a war between Poseidon and Zeus.  105.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: That's why you hid it in your shield and gave it to me?...

dialogues.speaker: LUKE
dialogues.text: When I discovered that you were going to the underworld, I realized... If Hades got his hand on the bolt... There would be a three way war. Percy ACTIVATES Riptide. Luke ROCKETS toward Percy, SWIPE at him with his sword. Percy DEFLECTS the blow, FALLING o the ground. Percy DROPS the bolt. It begins to ROLL AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Annabeth! The bolt! Annabeth RUSHES to the bolt. Luke SWOOPS DOWN, delivers a SPINNING KICK that sends Annabeth CRASHING into a parked Luke GRABS the bolt, FLIES UP onto a building ledge above Percy and Sally RUN to Annabeth, help her up. Annabeth's SHAKEN, the WIND KNOCKED OUT of her. They hear a SLOW, BUZZING SOUND. They look to the DIRECTION of the sound... The sound EMANATES from the bolt in Luke's hand. There is HAIRLINE CRACK at the top of the bolt. BRIGHT, tentacled SPARKS OF ELECTRICITY emit from the crack. Luke GENTLY MOVES his hand. The slightest movement RELEASES LIGHTNING from the bolt. STRONGER the movement, the more ELECTRICITY is released.. Luke's eyes burn with a newfound POWER. Percy CALLS to hi

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Why do you want a war of the gods?

dialogues.speaker: LUKE
dialogues.text: Control. They've been in power for too many years. It's time for our generation to take over. Centuries ago, the Olympians defeated their parents and took control. Why shouldn't we do the same?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Because you'll destroy all of mankind in the process..

dialogues.speaker: LUKE
dialogues.text: Exactly. Giving the young Gods an opportunity to start over, to create a new world of heroes...  106.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You're no hero. With a quick SNAP of his wrist, Luke TRIGGERS the bolt. A BLAST OF LIGHTING shoots out and blows a MASSIVE HOLE i the building behind Percy, Annabeth and Sally. They LEAP OF THE WAY as concrete and brick fall around them. Luke smiles, glances to the bolt, impressed. Percy glances to a nearby FIRE HYDRANT, CONCENTRATING on Luke AIMS the bolt at them again. He FIRES. They DASH out of the way. The lightning STRIKES a nearby EMPTY GARBAGE TRUCK. The truck is INCINERATED, leaving a massive CRATER the street. Directly below Luke, the FIRE HYDRANT starts to SHAKE. Lu DOESN'T NOTICE. FURIOUS, Luke glares at Percy, Annabeth and Sally... He A the bolt, about to BLAST THEM, when... The fire hydrant b EXPLODES. Water SHOOTS UPWARD and BLASTS Luke. The force KNOCKS LUKE OFF the building ledge. Luke FALLS, LANDS on the ground. DAZED, nearly UNCONSCIOUS. The lightning bolt LIES on the ground, a few feet beside Percy DRAWS his sword, RUNS forward and REACHES DOWN, abo to grab the bolt... Luke is QUICK. He DRAWS his sword, LEAPS to his feet and STOPS Percy from getting the bolt. Luke and Percy FACE OF against each other. The bolt is on the ground BETWEEN THE They begin to FIGHT, swords CLASHING. Percy SHOUTS to Annabeth and Sally.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Get to Olympus! Tell Zeus everything! Annabeth and Sally RUN INSIDE the Empire State Building. Percy and Luke continue a HEATED BATTLE. Percy is nearly Luke's equal. They fight like TWO WARRIORS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annabeth and Sally RUN INSIDE. The SECURITY GUARD calls o

dialogues.speaker: SECURITY GUARD
dialogues.text: Hey!... Observation deck's closed--  107. Annabeth and Sally IGNORE him, JUMP into an OPEN ELEVATOR The DOORS CLOSE, just as the Security Guard RUNS UP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and Percy are still in a HEATED SWORDFIGHT. Luke is FASTER. He PULLS BACK his sword. WHACK! SLICES across Percy's midsection. Percy FALLS to his knees, BLEEDING, a DEEP CUT ACROSS his torso. Luke GRABS the bolt. He TURNS to the Empire State Building, AIMS the bolt at t rooftop, toward the LIGHTNING ROD perched here. Luke SNAP his wrist, FIRES at the lightning rod. A DIRECT HIT, ENGULFING the building in a WEB OF INTENSE ELECTRICITY. The Empire State Building's POWER GOES OUT, along with ha of the block. The building's lights FLICKER OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator lights GO OUT. The elevator STOPS. Annabeth and Sally exchange a WORRIED glance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy RISES, holding Riptide and CONCENTRATING on somethi OFFSCREEN. Luke AIMS the bolt at PERCY'S HEART. Concentrating, Percy causes two more fire hydrants to EXPLODE. Instead of the water shooting up, the water TAKES ON A LI OF ITS OWN. It TURNS and WHIPS BACK toward Luke, about to PUMMEL HIM. Luke deftly FLIES around the water, outmaneuvers it with winged shoes. Luke takes AIM, about to FIRE at Percy... Percy DIVES. Luke FIRES A LIGHTNING BLAST. It BLOWS out the windows of a storefront, causing a WALL SMOKE and FALLING DEBRIS. Luke searches for Percy, CAN'T SEE him.  108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy DUCKS into an alley, grabs his backpack and removes pair of... WINGED SHOES. Percy hurriedly PUTS ON THE SHOES. He sees Luke FLY PAST. Percy takes off, FLYING RIGHT AT HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HIGH SPEED CHASE between Percy and Luke, FLYING through cavernous streets of Manhattan. Luke looks back and FIRES at Percy. Percy DEFLECTS with h sword blade. They arrive over the SHORES OF THE HUDSON. Percy picks up speed, SLAMS into Luke from behind. Luke DROPS the lightning bolt. It LANDS on the grassy shore below. Percy and Luke begin a mid-air SWORDFIGHT, as they move o over the Hudson River. They fight in the air like two acrobatics, FLIPPING, SPIN as their swords clash. Luke delivers several DEVASTATING BLOWS. Percy is WEAKENE BLEEDING, but still fighting like a hero. Luke SLICES THE WINGS off of Percy's left shoe. Percy LOSES altitude. He STRUGGLES to stay in the air. Percy FALLS and SLAMS into a WOODEN DOCK. He's SHAKEN. OU OF BREATH. Badly WOUNDED. Luke FLIES down toward Percy, sword in hand. Percy EXTENDS his hand toward the River. He TIGHTENS his brow. Using every bit of his strength, every muscle in hi body, Percy CLOSES HIS EYES. Concentrates INTENSELY. Luke LANDS on the dock, directly in front of Percy. Luke RAISES his sword, to FINISH OFF Percy...

dialogues.speaker: LUKE
dialogues.text: It's over. I've won. The river begins to RUMBLE. CHURN. WAVES form.  109. Luke TURNS, sees... An ENORMOUS WAVE. HEADING STRAIGHT fo them. Luke starts to RUN, attempts to FLY AWAY. The wave completely ENGULFS Percy, Luke and the dock. The water appears to REACH OUT and GRAB Luke out of the air. wave PULLS HIM DOWN UNDER THE WATER.

dialogues.speaker: NIGHT
dialogues.text: The wave FORMS a WHIRLPOOL around Luke. He is being DRAGG beneath the water below, SCREAMING. Within moments... Luke's screams FADE. He's GONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUNDER CRACKS in the sky above New York. Waves CRASH against the shore. And then... majestically... Percy RISES UP out of the water, as if he is being CARRIE the sea. He RIDES the wave, controlling its every move. H looks down, sees the lightning bolt LYING ON THE SHORE BE Percy RIDES the wave low, REACHES DOWN and SNATCHES the lightning bolt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy RIDES THE WAVE through the streets of Manhattan lik SURFER without a board. The DARKENED Empire State Building is dead ahead. Percy RAISES the bolt, extends it toward the LIGHTNING RO at the TOP of the Building. Percy FIRES the bolt. The Empire State Building is engulfed in ELECTRICITY, RESTORING POWER to the building. The lights FLICKER, TURN BACK ON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights SNAP ON. Annabeth and Sally are surprised, the car starts to MOVE. GOING UPWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wave CARRIES Percy right up to the entrance of the Em State Building. Percy STEPS OFF, looks up at a clock, on nearby building. It reads: 11:55 PM.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Five minutes...  110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annabeth and Sally get out. Moments later, Percy EXITS another elevator, the lightning bolt in his hand. Annabet GRABS Percy by the arm, leads him forward.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: We have exactly ninety seconds to get to Olympus. Annabeth leads Percy and Sally to a small SUPPLY CLOSET. OPENS the door. Inside, is a tiny, cluttered CLOSET fille with cleaning supplies. They ENTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annabeth REMOVES cleaning supplies from the shelves. Behi the middle shelf, on the wall, is a rusty BUTTON that rea FLOOR 600. Annabeth PUSHES the button. The supply closet door CLOSES The room RUMBLES, becoming an ELEVATOR. They move UPWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elevator door OPENS. Percy, Annabeth, and Sally step out. Below them, is the STORMY SKYLINE of Manhattan, from the height of an airplane. In front, marble steps wind up into the spine of a cloud, into the sky. From the top of clouds, rises the decapitated PEAK OF A MOUNTAIN, its sum covered with snow. Clinging to the mountainside, are doze of multi-leveled PALACES. At the top of the peak, the LARGEST PALACE gleams against the snow. Percy stares in a

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Olympus. They hear a FAMILIAR VOICE.

dialogues.speaker: CHIRON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Cutting it close. CHIRON is standing beside them.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY /ANNABETH
dialogues.text: Chiron!

dialogues.speaker: CHIRON
dialogues.text: Let's go. They RACE up the TORCH LIT stairs.  111.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ROOM looks out over all of Olympus. Twelve GIGANTIC, ELEVATED THRONES, are arranged in an inverted U, around a SWIRLING, LIVING GLOBE. All of the Olympians are seated a present: Zeus, Hera, Poseidon, Apollo, Artemis, Hestia, Hephaestus, Ares, Hermes, Demeter, Aphrodite, and Athena. In the first throne, is ZEUS. He resembles a strong, ROMA EMPEROR, a sculpted, grim face, his eyes rainy grey, with well trimmed beard. Next to him is POSEIDON. He resembles a handsome SURFER. His skin is deeply tanned, hands scarred like an old fisherman's. His hair is long, sun streaked. His striking blue eyes are identical to Percy's. A faded tattoo of a TRIDENT is on his muscular forearm. The Gods are in the middle of an intense, HEATED ARGUMENT Zeus and Poseidon are the most angry, looking as if they' about to get into a fist-fight. Athena tries to intervene

dialogues.speaker: ATHENA
dialogues.text: Brothers, brothers... Please... Sit down, discuss this rationally... War is not the answer.

dialogues.speaker: ARES
dialogues.text: Sure it is. It always is. An ANCIENT CLOCK on the wall COUNTS DOWN... Oneee Seee Gees Zeus gets right into Poseidon's face. 3.22 2.2. lene

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: Let the war begin--

dialogues.speaker: CHIRON, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Lord Zeus! Wait! The Gods TURN to the sound of Chiron's VOICE. Chiron RUNS into the throne room, along with Percy, Annabeth and Sall We realize that the throne room and the gods are GIGANTIC The Gods are each nearly THIRTY FEET TALL, DWARFING Chiro and the humans. Athena is SURPRISED to see Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: ATHENA
dialogues.text: Annabeth?

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: (nervous ) Hey, Mom.  112. Percy steps forward, holding the MASTER LIGHTNING BOLT.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Hi. I'm... My name's Percy Jackson. And, I... I think you guys might be looking for this... Zeus looks at Poseidon, who can't help but smile a little Zeus GLARES at Percy.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: The Lightning Thief. I knew it. (extends his hand) Bring it to me. Percy walks forward, places the bolt up into Zeus' GIGANT PALM. When it is placed into Zeus' hand, the bolt GROWS B to its normal size.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: Congratulations. You've managed to save what's left of your Father's reputation. Percy turns, exchanges his FIRST LOOK with Poseidon. Perc eyes remain COLD, HARD. He TURNS back to Zeus.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I didn't steal the lightning bolt. If my father had asked me to do something for him, I would have said "no" (indifferent) I have no loyalty to him. I owe him nothing. Poseidon lowers his head slightly. Zeus smiles, amused.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: I believe you owe your personality to him. (pauses, curious) But if you didn't take the bolt... Why do you have it?

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: It was stolen by Luke, son of Hermes.

dialogues.speaker: HERMES
dialogues.text: (surprised) I have a son named Luke? Zeus raises an eyebrow to Percy.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: Why should I believe you?  113.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: You don't have to. All you have to do is honor your word. I've returned the bolt by the summer solstice. Now call off the war. Zeus turns to Poseidon, back to Percy.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: For the sake of peace in our family, there will be no war. (to Percy) You have done me a great service. If there's ever anything I can do for you, feel free to ask--

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: There's a Satyr, my protector... named Grover... He's being held prisoner by Hades. Could you set him free? Zeus contemplates this, not so sure. Poseidon intervenes.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: You could make a trade... I hear that Percy killed many of Hades' pets... (turns to Percy) Did you keep any tokens? Percy digs the MINOTAUR HORN out of his backpack.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: This.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: (takes the horn) That will do. Hades loved that hideous beast. He can grow a new one with this. Yes... I think we'll be able to get your friend released. Annabeth steps forward, tentatively at first.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I have an announcement. All of the Gods TURN to her. Annabeth TAKES Percy's hand.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: The son of Poseidon and the daughter of Athena are officially--

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: --In love.  114. They exchange a KISS, much to the shock of Athena and Poseidon. Annabeth looks at Athena and Poseidon.

dialogues.speaker: ANNABETH
dialogues.text: I think it's about time you two stopped hating on each other. Poseidon and Athena sigh, holding back their anger, putti aside their feelings. For now. Zeus finds it all very amusing, laughing.

dialogues.speaker: ZEUS
dialogues.text: Our meeting is adjourned. (glares at Poseidon) I still don't trust you. And with that, Zeus VANISHES in a blinding flash of lightning. Athena LOOKS at Annabeth.

dialogues.speaker: ATHENA
dialogues.text: We'll discuss this later, young lady. Athena VANISHES. All of the Gods begin to VANISH. One by one. Everyone... EXCEPT POSEIDON. He looks down, catches Sally's eye for the first time. Poseidon steps off the throne, walks forward. With each step, he becomes SMALLER, soon becoming the size of a MOR Poseidon walks to Sally, gives her a TENDER KISS.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: Good to see you, Sally. You look beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: You too. Of course, you have that eternal youth thing going on. They exchange a warm SMILE. Poseidon turns, approaches Percy. They look at each other. An estranged Father and son, meeting for the FIRST TIME. It's TENSE, UNCOMFORTABL

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: I can't thank you enough, Percy. Few heroes in history could have accomplished what you've done. I'm proud of you, son-- He EXTENDS his hand. Percy IGNORES it, COLDLY. There is a long silence, YEARS OF TENSION between them. Sally nods t Annabeth and Chiron, LOOKS BACK to Percy.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: We'll leave you two alone. Sally, Annabeth and Chiron move several feet away. Percy TURNS to the window, looks out over the lands of Olympus.  115.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: I'm not asking you to like me...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No need. I didn't do it for you, I did it to save mom.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: I know that. Percy continues to stare out at the LANDSCAPE OF OLYMPUS, back turned too Poseidon. Percy has so many questions... speaks softly, a DEEP SADNESS in his voice...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: How old was I? When you left?

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: Seven months.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Do you remember any of it?

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: Every moment. You were a beautiful boy. Your Mother and I were in love. I could have stayed forever...

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: But you didn't.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: I had other responsibilities.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: More important than us? Percy turns, FACES Poseidon, who doesn't answer.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I didn't care if you were there all the time... But I would have liked to see you... even for a day... an hour... (upset) Why didn't you ever come back?

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: (pauses, difficult) I wanted to. I just... When I was with you... and your Mother...I became less concerned about my responsibilities... I was ignoring my natural destiny. (softly) I was becoming human.  116.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: And that's bad?

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: For a God? For the future of the universe? Yes, Percy. That's bad.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: What about these last two weeks?... I almost died out there... But you didn't do anything. You didn't help me.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: I was looking out for you every step of the way. When you needed me, I was there. Who do you think sent the horses in the desert? Who spoke to you, gave you clarity in Lotus Land?... (passionate) Just because you didn't see me, doesn't mean I wasn't there. When you sit in the bottom of the pool, trying to figure out your life, the voice in your head is me.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (understanding) So that's you...

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: (nods ) Passing out what advice I can. Most of which, you tend to ignore, by the way. A TINY SMILE appears on Percy's face. Percy softens, understands how complicated this must be for his Father.

dialogues.speaker: POSEIDON
dialogues.text: I know this isn't the father-son relationship you've always wanted, but it's the best I can do. (sincere) I hope someday you'll see that.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: (long pause) Olympus wasn't built in a day. Poseidon smiles, EXTENDS his hand again. Percy pauses, slowly SHAKES IT. Poseidon pulls him close, in for an EMBRACE. Their FIRST hug. Sally is watching, a smile on her face, TEARS in her eyes  117.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DARK, OVERCAST DAY in New York City. Sweeping STORM CLO fill the air. Distant THUNDER rumbles. GABE sits alone, i front of the TV, watching the news, drinking a beer.

dialogues.speaker: NEWS ANCHOR
dialogues.text: Authorities have now confirmed that Percy Jackson and his mother have been safely returned after their month long ordeal. Police now know that the two had been kidnapped by this man... A picture of ARES taken from a SECURITY CAMERA at the All American diner appears on screen.

dialogues.speaker: NEWS ANCHOR
dialogues.text: The FBI has confirmed that he is also the man responsible for vandalizing the Parthenon in Nashville and the beheading of at least one other victim. If you have any information leading to-- Gabe CLICKS OFF the TV, annoyed. He CRUSHES the beer can.

dialogues.speaker: GABE
dialogues.text: Sally! I need another beer!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy and his mom are reclining in BEACH CHAIRS, sipping drinks. Annabeth sits in Percy's lap, arms around each other. In the background, GROVER stands at a GRILL, flipping burgers. PERSEPHONE stands beside Grover, hand tucked int his back pocket. She nibbles lustfully on his earlobe. The sky is getting DARKER with storm clouds. THUNDER ROLL Percy looks at his Mother.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: I want to show you something. (a pause) Promise you won't be mad?

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: Oh, no. Now what? Percy lifts up his shirt sleeve, revealing a TATTOO of a TRIDENT on his right deltoid. It's an exact COPY of his Father, Poseidon's, tattoo. Sally touches it, her face flooding with FOND MEMORIES.  118.

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: I love it. (a beat) Is it permanent? Percy pauses, shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Nothing's permanent, Mom. Annabeth RAISES an eyebrow to him. Percy smiles.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: Well... Maybe one thing. They share a small kiss. Very much in love. There is a LO CRACK OF THUNDER. The clouds get DARKER. Grover, cooking the burgers, looks up into the sky.

dialogues.speaker: GROVER
dialogues.text: Maybe we should move this party inside.

dialogues.speaker: PERCY
dialogues.text: No. I like it out here. The sky ERUPTS with THUNDER, followed by several, intense bright BLASTS OF LIGHTNING. Percy watches the lightning show, REFLECTED in his eyes. Then... it begins to RAIN. T drops fall slowly at first, soon becoming a DOWNPOUR. Grover, Persephone and Sally DUCK for cover, beneath a rooftop overhang. Percy stays where he is, Annabeth's head resting on his shoulder. The cool rain showers over the couple. A smile covers Percy's face, along with something else we've neve seen... an expression of PEACE and CONTENTMENT. From OFFSCREEN we hear...

dialogues.speaker: GABE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Sally! Beer!

dialogues.speaker: SALLY
dialogues.text: Get it yourself, you lazy bum! Percy looks back, exchanges a smile with Sally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIGHTNING CRACKS! Gabe storms into the kitchen, muttering

dialogues.speaker: GABE
dialogues.text: Get it myself?!? You're gettin' to be as lazy as that loser son of yours! Well, I got news for both of you... Gabe REACHES for the refrigerator door.  119.

dialogues.speaker: GABE
dialogues.text: I'm the king of this castle and there are gonna' be some changes made around here-- Gabe OPENS the refrigerator and looks in horror. He sees. The HEAD OF MEDUSA. EYES WIDE OPEN. STARING back at Gabe. There's a LOUD LIGHTNING CRACK! THE SCREEN GOES WHITE. THE END.
